statements: SELECT * FROM migration_patterns;
SELECT animal_name, migration_type FROM migration_patterns WHERE migration_season = 'Spring';
SELECT animal_name, migration_type, migration_distance FROM migration_patterns WHERE migration_distance > 100;
SELECT animal_id, animal_name, migration_type, migration_distance FROM migration_patterns ORDER BY migration_distance DESC;
SELECT animal_id, animal_name, migration_type, migration_season FROM migration_patterns WHERE migration_type = 'Land';
SELECT * FROM migration_patterns WHERE animal_name = 'Eagle' AND migration_type = 'Long-distance' ORDER BY migration_distance DESC;
SELECT animal_name, migration_type, migration_season FROM migration_patterns WHERE migration_distance > 100 ORDER BY animal_name ASC;
SELECT animal_name, migration_distance FROM migration_patterns WHERE migration_season = 'Summer' AND migration_distance BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY migration_distance ASC;
SELECT animal_id, animal_name, migration_type, migration_distance FROM migration_patterns WHERE migration_type LIKE '%distance%' ORDER BY animal_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM migration_patterns WHERE migration_season = 'Winter' ORDER BY animal_name ASC, migration_distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM Animals;
SELECT species, migration_status FROM Animals WHERE affected_by_climate_change = TRUE;
SELECT species, migration_status FROM Animals ORDER BY species ASC;
SELECT * FROM Animals WHERE species = 'Elephant';
SELECT * FROM MigrationEvents WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Animals WHERE species = 'Elephant';
SELECT species, migration_status FROM Animals WHERE affected_by_climate_change = TRUE ORDER BY species ASC;
SELECT * FROM Animals JOIN MigrationEvents ON Animals.animal_id = MigrationEvents.animal_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_animals, migration_status FROM Animals GROUP BY migration_status;
SELECT DISTINCT migration_status FROM MigrationEvents WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM AnimalMigration;
SELECT animal_name, migration_destination FROM AnimalMigration WHERE migration_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT climate_id, temperature FROM ClimateData ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM MigrationRoute WHERE migration_distance > 1000;

SELECT animal_name, weather_condition FROM AnimalMigration INNER JOIN MigrationRoute ON AnimalMigration.animal_id = MigrationRoute.animal_id INNER JOIN ClimateData ON MigrationRoute.climate_id = ClimateData.climate_id WHERE ClimateData.humidity > 50;
SELECT * FROM AnimalMigration WHERE animal_id = 1;
SELECT animal_name, migration_date FROM AnimalMigration WHERE migration_destination = 'North Pole';
SELECT climate_id, temperature, humidity FROM ClimateData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT * FROM MigrationRoute WHERE migration_distance BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;

SELECT AnimalMigration.animal_name, ClimateData.weather_condition FROM AnimalMigration JOIN MigrationRoute ON AnimalMigration.animal_id = MigrationRoute.animal_id JOIN ClimateData ON MigrationRoute.climate_id = ClimateData.climate_id;
SELECT * FROM Animal;
SELECT species, migration_pattern FROM Animal WHERE species = 'Elephant';
SELECT * FROM Location ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM Location WHERE longitude < 0;
SELECT record_id, migration_date FROM MigrationRecord WHERE migration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Animal ORDER BY species ASC;
SELECT * FROM MigrationRecord WHERE migration_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY migration_date DESC;
SELECT species, migration_pattern FROM Animal WHERE species LIKE 'Bird%' AND migration_pattern = 'Seasonal';
SELECT impact_description, impact_date FROM ClimateChangeImpact WHERE impact_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Location WHERE latitude < 0 AND longitude > 0 ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM animals;
SELECT animal_name, species, climate_impact FROM animals;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 0;
SELECT animal_name, species, migration_pattern, sighting_date FROM animals JOIN sightings ON animals.animal_id = sightings.animal_id;
SELECT location_name, temperature, humidity, precipitation FROM locations JOIN climate_conditions ON locations.location_id = climate_conditions.location_id;
SELECT * FROM animals ORDER BY animal_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT species, COUNT(*) as total_count FROM animals GROUP BY species ORDER BY total_count DESC;

SELECT animal_name, species, migration_pattern FROM animals JOIN migration_routes ON animals.animal_id = migration_routes.animal_id WHERE migration_routes.route_description LIKE '%long%' ORDER BY animal_name ASC;

SELECT animals.animal_name, locations.location_name, sightings.sighting_date FROM animals JOIN sightings ON animals.animal_id = sightings.animal_id JOIN locations ON sightings.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE sightings.sighting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT location_name, AVG(temperature) as avg_temperature, AVG(humidity) as avg_humidity, AVG(precipitation) as avg_precipitation FROM locations JOIN climate_conditions ON locations.location_id = climate_conditions.location_id GROUP BY location_name HAVING AVG(temperature) > 25 AND AVG(humidity) < 70 ORDER BY location_name ASC;
